name: pumpkintips
0:
”Alexa, open Pumpkin Tips”
”What kinds of tools should I use for pumpkin carving”
”How can I make my pumpkin last longer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pumpkin tips
des: This skill gathers together a collection of tips to help you with each step of creating your very own jack-o-lantern. Learn how to select the appropriate pumpkin, what tools are best to use, how to prepare your pumpkin, some ways to copy over a pattern or stencil, tips to help you carve out the pattern, what type of lighting to use, and some preservation methods.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
